import React,{FC, useState,useEffect} from 'react' import InputTogle from '../InputTogle/InputTogle' import cl from './WeathercardMain.module.css' import { getDayOfMonth,getMonthName,getNameOfDayWeek,getTime } from '../../helpers/helper' interface WeatherCardMainProps{ data:any } const WeatherCardMain:FC = ({data}) => { const [weatherSystem,setWeatherSystem] = useState(true) console.log(data) return (

{weatherSystem ? Math.round(data.current.temp_c): Math.round(data.current.temp_f)} {weatherSystem ? '℃' : '℉'}

{getDayOfMonth(data.location.localtime)}th {getMonthName(data.location.localtime)} ‘{}

{getNameOfDayWeek(data.location.localtime)} | {getTime(data.location.localtime,weatherSystem)}

Wind

{weatherSystem ? data.current.kph + '' : data.current.mph}

|

Hum

%

|

Rain

0.2%

) } export default WeatherCardMain
